title: Drawing, "Wall Decoration", ca. 1776
medium:
Pen and black ink, watercolor, graphite, ruled border in pen and black
Support: white laid paper laid down on white wove paper
inscribed: inscribed in pen and brown ink, lower center: Pirgolesi 1776 Del. et pinx; at top right corner, pen and lack ink: 20

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Wall Decoration", ca. 1776.
ca. 1776. Pen and black ink, watercolor, graphite, ruled border in pen and black
Support: white laid paper laid down on white wove paper. Gift of Unknown Donor. 1980-32-1430.
